thread.title: Apples enterprise push will depend on more than just hardware

title: Apples enterprise push will depend on more than just hardware
text:
Apple's enterprise push will depend on more than just hardware 
ZDNet Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Apple is getting serious about selling into business, but may find budget-focused executives harder to win over than consumers entranced by elegant gadgets. Last month Tim Cook revealed that Apple's enterprise push...
